text: Everyone Says I Love You is a 1996 American movie directed by Woody Allen. It stars Allen, Alan Alda, Drew Barrymore, Tim Roth, Natalie Portman and Julia Roberts. It was released in December 1996. ==References== Category:1996 musical movies Category:1996 comedy movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen Category:English-language movies
title: Everyone Says I Love You
